waitingOn.what: NoteLite project planning + implementation (Normal Greenfield, full BMAD pipeline test)
waitingOn.notes: Phase 1 planning in progress as of 15:34 (PRD✅ UX✅ Arch✅, epics/stories next). YOLO mode added to all agent configs but this run started before those updates.

waitingOn.expectedCompletion: ~14:18-14:36 CST (38-56 min from spawn) — may be overdue
waitingOn.notes: Testing v2.0 workflow (broad→narrow, config-driven, LLM dedup, Carson naming). Should write first entry to project-registry.json.

notes.text: Pre-compaction state flush #4. NoteLite PL session active (planning phase). RL v2.0 test may be overdue — check on next heartbeat. Dashboard log viewing fix deployed (logs-section.tsx + page.tsx). YOLO mode added to all 14 agent configs.

Fixed dashboard session log viewing: logs-section.tsx now resolves sessionKey→agentType→sessions.json→real sessionId→.jsonl transcript. Also fixed page.tsx to scan projects/active/ and projects/archived/ subdirs.

Added YOLO MODE to all 14 BMAD agent AGENTS.md files. BMAD workflows default to interactive mode, halting at every confirmation. Without YOLO, subagents timeout. Two-layer defense: orchestrators include directive + agents have standing YOLO instructions.
Spawned Project Lead for NoteLite (block-based Notion clone) — Full BMAD pipeline test
State architecture migration complete: All core docs updated (kelly-router, project-lead, project-registry, kelly-improver)
Migrated to minimal state architecture (4 systems: registry, kelly, BMAD, memory)
